Title: AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED THREE HUNDRED THIRTY ENTITLED "AN ACT APPROPRIATING NINETY-SIX MILLION THREE HUNDRED FIFTY-ONE THOUSAND AND THREE HUNDRED PESOS FOR PUBLIC WORKS."
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 390, September 05, 1938 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED THREE HUNDRED THIRTY ENTITLED "AN ACT APPROPRIATING NINETY-SIX MILLION THREE HUNDRED FIFTY-ONE THOUSAND AND THREE HUNDRED PESOS FOR PUBLIC WORKS."
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. Section one, subsection B, paragraph (c), of Commonwealth Act Numbered Three hundred thirty is amended so as to read as follows:


"(c) 1. For aid for the construction and equipment of provincial hospitals and for the  improvement of the Mariveles Quarantine Station, Bataan.......................................
₱2,000,000.00


"2. For laborers dwellings, as contemplated by Act Numbered Forty-one hundred eighty-four, as amended ...........................................................................
100,000.00"


Section 2. Section one, subsection C, paragraph (q), item numbered 33, of Commonwealth Act Numbered Three hundred thirty is amended so as to read as follows:


"33. Bukidnon-Davao Road via Danka-gan and Tugbok ............................................
₱1,000,000.00"

B. The following items are suppressed: Bulacan, items numbered 20, 21, and 35; Capiz, item numbered 71; Cebu, items numbered 98, 99, and 100; Iloilo, item numbered 71; Laguna, item numbered 3; Leyte, items numbered 97 and 100; Masbate, item numbered 11; Mountain Province item numbered 31; Nueva Vizcaya, items numbered 18, 19, 20, 22, 30, and 31.


Section 4. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, September 5, 1938.
